AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCompany}, '%')
select COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = MANAGER_ID) AS MANAGER_ID from T_COMPANY_INFO where COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}

SELECT TUI.USER_NAME, TUI.USER_ID, TUI.COMPANY_ID, TCI.COMPANY_NAME, CASE WHEN TUI.USER_CLASS = 'USER' THEN '일반사용자' WHEN TUI.USER_CLASS = 'ADMIN' THEN '관리자' WHEN TUI.USER_CLASS = 'SYSADMIN' THEN '최고관리자' END AS USER_CLASS FROM T_USER_INFO TUI LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_INFO TCI ON (TUI.COMPANY_ID = TCI.COMPANY_ID) WHERE TUI.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND TUI.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
AND TUI.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND TCI.COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCompany}, '%')
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_USER_INFO TUI LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY_INFO TCI ON (TUI.COMPANY_ID = TCI.COMPANY_ID) WHERE TUI.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND TUI.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
AND TUI.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
